thread.title: Joyce Carroll
thread.title_full: American Freight Furniture & Mattress reviewed by Joyce Carroll

author: Joyce Carroll
title: Joyce Carroll
text:
I put a 10.00 deposit on a mattress about a month ago and still have not received my deposit back since I purchased the mattress at another store.
I do have to say the sales people was excellent, though.
